snippet.title: Montgomery County and Frederick County home sales
snippet.description: Residential real estate transactions in Montgomery and Frederick counties

snippet.title: Russian Barre Remains High
snippet.description: ST. PETERSBURG In February 1972, as the Moscow correspondent of this newspaper, I visited the Vaganova Ballet Academy, principal training ground for the renowned Kirov/Maryinski Ballet, in its historic home in Leningrad -- then the name of this exotic city on the Neva River. I was a young reporter...
